languages.text: Ахиллеас смешивается с делегацией и одним ударом сносит голову предводителю друкари. В последовавшей резне Ахиллеас погибает, забирая с собой нескольких захватчиков. Семена раздора посеяны — друкари обвиняют друг друга в покушении с целью занять место предводителя. Разобщенные, они не способны организовать атаку на колонию и покидают систему.

Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.
languages.original_text: Ахиллеас смешивается с делегацией и одним ударом сносит голову предводителю друкари. В последовавшей резне Ахиллеас погибает, забирая с собой нескольких захватчиков. Семена раздора посеяны — друкари обвиняют друг друга в покушении с целью занять место предводителя. Разобщенные, они не способны организовать атаку на колонию и покидают систему.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.
The xenos suspect nothing until Achilleas takes their leader's head with a single stroke. The disfigured agent falls in battle, taking with him several Drukhari.

The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.

Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. languages.text: Achilleas se mêle à la délégation et décapite le chef drukhari d'un coup net et précis avant de trouver la mort dans le carnage qui s'ensuit, emportant avec lui plusieurs envahisseurs. Les graines de la discorde ont été semées : les xénos s'accusent mutuellement d'avoir assassiné leur chef dans le but de prendre le pouvoir. Désormais divisés, ils sont incapables d'organiser une attaque conjointe contre la colonie et quittent le système.
languages.original_text: Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas se mêle à la délégation et décapite le chef drukhari d'un coup net et précis avant de trouver la mort dans le carnage qui s'ensuit, emportant avec lui plusieurs envahisseurs. Les graines de la discorde ont été semées : les xénos s'accusent mutuellement d'avoir assassiné leur chef dans le but de prendre le pouvoir. Désormais divisés, ils sont incapables d'organiser une attaque conjointe contre la colonie et quittent le système.

languages.text: アキレアスは代表団に紛れ込み、一撃でデュカーリのリーダーの首を落とした。アキレアスは複数人のインヴェイダーを巻き添えにして、殺戮の中で息絶えた。不和の種は撒かれた。異種族たちは権力を掌握するべく、自分たちのリーダーを暗殺したのは相手だとお互いを非難しあう。分断された彼らはコロニーを責めることができず、星系を去った。
languages.original_text: Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: アキレアスは代表団に紛れ込み、一撃でデュカーリのリーダーの首を落とした。アキレアスは複数人のインヴェイダーを巻き添えにして、殺戮の中で息絶えた。不和の種は撒かれた。異種族たちは権力を掌握するべく、自分たちのリーダーを暗殺したのは相手だとお互いを非難しあう。分断された彼らはコロニーを責めることができず、星系を去った。

languages.text: 阿吉里亚斯混进了代表团之中，一击就砍掉了黑暗灵族领袖的头颅。在接下来的战斗中，阿吉里亚斯壮烈牺牲，顺便拉上了几个黑暗灵族陪葬。你们在黑暗灵族之中播撒下了分裂的种子，他们彼此攻讦，指责对方暗杀领袖，意欲夺取权力。如今，黑暗灵族陷入了分裂，无法再对殖民地发起攻击，也无法离开这个星系。
languages.original_text: Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: 阿吉里亚斯混进了代表团之中，一击就砍掉了黑暗灵族领袖的头颅。在接下来的战斗中，阿吉里亚斯壮烈牺牲，顺便拉上了几个黑暗灵族陪葬。你们在黑暗灵族之中播撒下了分裂的种子，他们彼此攻讦，指责对方暗杀领袖，意欲夺取权力。如今，黑暗灵族陷入了分裂，无法再对殖民地发起攻击，也无法离开这个星系。

languages.text: Achilleas se infiltra en la delegación y decapita a la líder Drukhari de un solo golpe. El hombre muere en la masacre posterior, llevándose consigo a varios de los invasores. Esto siembra las semillas de la discordia: los xenos se acusan mutuamente de asesinar a su líder para hacerse con el poder. Divididos, son incapaces de organizar un ataque contra la colonia y abandonan el sistema.
languages.original_text: Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas se infiltra en la delegación y decapita a la líder Drukhari de un solo golpe. El hombre muere en la masacre posterior, llevándose consigo a varios de los invasores. Esto siembra las semillas de la discordia: los xenos se acusan mutuamente de asesinar a su líder para hacerse con el poder. Divididos, son incapaces de organizar un ataque contra la colonia y abandonan el sistema.

languages.text: Achilleas mischt sich unter die Gesandten und schlägt dem Drukhari-Anführer mit einem einzigen Hieb den Kopf ab. Achilleas fällt in den Blutbad, das darauf beinnt, reißt aber mehrere der Angreifer mit in den Untergang. Die Saat der Zwietracht ist ausgebracht: Die Xenos beschuldigen sich gegenseitig, ihren Anführer umgebracht zu haben, um die Macht an sich zu reißen. Sie sind nun tief gespalten und können daher keinen Angriff auf die Kolonie mehr ausführen. Die Xenos verlassen das System.
languages.original_text: Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.

languages.text: Achilleas, heyetin arasına sızarak tek bir hamlede Drukhari liderinin kafasını kesiyor. Ardından kopan arbedede birkaç istilacı ile birlikte can veriyor. Nifak tohumları ekildi: Zenolar, gücü ele geçirme niyetiyle liderlerine suikast düzenlemekle birbirlerini suçluyor. Artık bölünmüş olan bu güruh, koloniye saldıramadan sistemi terk ediyor.
languages.original_text: Achilleas blends in with the delegation and decapitates the Drukhari leader with a single blow. Achilleas perishes in the ensuing carnage, taking several of the invaders with him. The seeds of discord have been sown: the xenos accuse each other of assassinating their leader with the intent to seize power. Now divided, they are unable to mount an attack on the colony and leave the system.
